org.tigris.noodle.filters
Class CheckForRedirect

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.tigris.noodle.filters.CheckForRedirect
All Implemented Interfaces:
NoodleFilter, NoodleResponseFilter
public class CheckForRedirect
extends java.lang.Object
implements NoodleResponseFilter

This is the first proxy response filter which should be run. It checks for and propagates redirects sent out by the proxy.
